summary: VEHICLE WAS PARKED (OUT OF TOWN WEEKEND) WHEN STARTING UP TO GO HOME IT TOTALLY SHUT DOWN, LIGHT CAME STATING SOMETHING ABOUT COOLANT TEMPERATURE AND I HAD NO POWER WHAT SO EVER.  GOT TOWED TO FORD, ONLY HAD VEHICLE SINCE FEB. 2017, SAUDERED AND RECONNECTED SOME WIRING THAT THEY SAID WAS CHEWED BY SOME CRITTER, I.E. MOUSE.  $360. LATER.  AFTER DOING MY OWN RESEARCH I SEE WIRING IS BEING BEING COVERED IN SOME SOY COATING AND SEATS ARE MADE WITH OTHER PRODUCTS THAT CAN LURE CRITTERS.  I DON'T UNDERSTAND AND FEEL WHY SHOULD I PAY THAT OUT OF POCKET.
